A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: watched it together with my gf which is not a SW fan and therefore gave an unbiased opinion. She found it very boring\, to the point she started looking at her phone after one hour. My opinion as a SW fan is even worse... it's a petty such a good cast of actors were given such a terrible script. Apart from being boring\, the plot is stupid to say the least even for a 5-y old approaching the series for the first time. If Disney is so sure that killing all of the old characters gives the series a fresh start\, why don't they apply the same thinking to their original characters and chop Mickey Mouse's head off? :)
